analysis.key_quote: This whole idea goes against the long history of the Civil Service, which was started as a merit-based program instead of the politicized and spoils employment which had been in place previously.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of a merit-based civil service and criticizing the potential for politicization, which aligns with concerns about the integrity and fairness of the civil service system.
